mil5.1.5:1.2_2: etampi vacanaṁ sakasaṭaṁ saniggahaṁ sadosaṁ ‘hetusamugghāte ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ natthi dibbacakkhussa uppādo’ti sutte vuttaṁ, yadi, bhante nāgasena,
mil5.1.5:1.2_4: tena hi ‘puna dibbacakkhūni uppannānī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā;
mil5.1.5:1.3_1: tena hi ‘sivirājena yācakassa cakkhūni dinnānī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, tampi micchā.
mil5.1.5:1.4_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro veṭhatopi veṭhataro gahanatopi gahanataro, so tavānuppatto,
mil5.1.5:2.1_1: sivirājena yācakassa cakkhūni, tattha mā vimatiṁ uppādehi,
mil5.1.5:2.4_1: yena kāraṇena hetusamugghāte ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ dibbacakkhu uppajjati,
mil5.1.5:3.1_0: “Kiṁ pana, mahārāja, atthi loke saccaṁ nāma,
mil5.1.5:3.2_0: “Āma, bhante, atthi loke saccaṁ nāma, saccena, bhante nāgasena,
mil5.1.5:3.2_1: saccavādino saccakiriyaṁ katvā devaṁ vassāpenti, aggiṁ nibbāpenti, visaṁ paṭihananti,
mil5.1.5:3.3_1: yujjati sameti sivirājassa saccabalena dibbacakkhūni uppannānīti, saccabalena, mahārāja,
mil5.1.5:3.3_3: saccaṁyeva tattha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāya.
mil5.1.5:4.1_2: tesaṁ saha saccamanugītena mahāmegho pavassati, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil5.1.5:4.1_3: atthi ākāse vassahetu sannicito ‘yena hetunā mahāmegho pavassatī’”ti?
mil5.1.5:4.2_1: saccaṁyeva tattha hetu bhavati mahato meghassa pavassanāyā”ti.
mil5.1.5:4.3_1: saccaṁ yevettha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāyāti.
mil5.1.5:5.1_2: tesaṁ saha saccamanugītena jalitapajjalitamahāaggikkhandho khaṇena paṭinivattati.
mil5.1.5:5.2_1: atthi tasmiṁ jalitapajjalite mahāaggikkhandhe hetu sannicito ‘yena hetunā jalitapajjalitamahāaggikkhandho khaṇena paṭinivattatī’”ti?
mil5.1.5:5.3_1: saccaṁyeva tattha vatthu hoti tassa jalitapajjalitassa mahāaggikkhandhassa khaṇena paṭinivattanāyā”ti.
mil5.1.5:5.4_1: saccaṁ yevettha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāyāti.
mil5.1.5:6.1_1: ye keci sattā saccamanugāyanti ‘visaṁ halāhalaṁ agadaṁ bhavatū’ti.
mil5.1.5:6.2_0: Tesaṁ saha saccamanugītena visaṁ halāhalaṁ khaṇena agadaṁ bhavati, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil5.1.5:6.2_1: atthi tasmiṁ halāhalavise hetu sannicito ‘yena hetunā visaṁ halāhalaṁ khaṇena agadaṁ bhavatī’”ti?
mil5.1.5:6.3_1: saccaṁyeva tattha hetu bhavati visassa halāhalassa khaṇena paṭighātāyā”ti.
mil5.1.5:6.4_1: vinā pakatihetuṁ saccaṁ yevettha vatthu bhavati dibbacakkhussa uppādāyāti.
mil5.1.5:7.1_2: saccaṁ vatthuṁ katvā cattāri ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhantīti.
mil5.1.5:7.2_1: so mahāsamudde kīḷitukāmo catumāse catumāse saccakiriyaṁ katvā saha rathena antomahāsamudde yojanaṁ pavisati,
mil5.1.5:7.2_2: tassa rathasīsassa purato purato mahāvārikkhandho paṭikkamati, nikkhantassa puna ottharati, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil5.1.5:7.2_3: so mahāsamuddo sadevamanussenapi lokena pakatikāyabalena sakkā paṭikkamāpetun”ti?
mil5.1.5:7.3_1: taḷāke udakaṁ na sakkā sadevamanussenapi lokena pakatikāyabalena paṭikkamāpetuṁ,
mil5.1.5:7.4_1: kāraṇena saccabalaṁ ñātabbaṁ ‘natthi taṁ ṭhānaṁ, yaṁ saccena na pattabban’ti.
mil5.1.5:8.1_1: pāṭaliputte asoko dhammarājā sanegamajānapadaamaccabhaṭabalamahāmattehi parivuto gaṅgaṁ nadiṁ navasalilasampuṇṇaṁ samatitthikaṁ sambharitaṁ pañcayojanasatāyāmaṁ yojanaputhulaṁ sandamānaṁ disvā amacce evamāha—
mil5.1.5:9.1_0: Tasmiṁyeva gaṅgākūle ṭhitā bandhumatī nāma gaṇikā assosi raññā kira evaṁ vuttaṁ—
mil5.1.5:9.2_0: ‘sakkā nu kho imaṁ mahāgaṅgaṁ paṭisotaṁ sandāpetun’ti, sā evamāha—
mil5.1.5:9.4_1: saha tassā saccakiriyāya khaṇena sā mahāgaṅgā gaḷagaḷāyantī paṭisotaṁ sandittha mahato janakāyassa passato.
mil5.1.5:10.1_0: Atha rājā gaṅgāya āvaṭṭaūmivegajanitaṁ halāhalasaddaṁ sutvā vimhito acchariyabbhutajāto amacce evamāha—
mil5.1.5:10.3_1: gaṇikā tava vacanaṁ sutvā saccakiriyaṁ akāsi,
mil5.1.5:11.1_0: Atha saṁviggahadayo rājā turitaturito sayaṁ gantvā taṁ gaṇikaṁ pucchi—
mil5.1.5:11.2_1: tayā saccakiriyāya ayaṁ gaṅgā paṭisotaṁ sandāpitā’ti?
mil5.1.5:11.5_1: ko vā te vacanaṁ ādiyati anummatto,
mil5.1.5:11.5_2: kena tvaṁ balena imaṁ mahāgaṅgaṁ paṭisotaṁ sandāpesī’ti?
mil5.1.5:11.9_0: ‘kiṁ te saccabalaṁ atthi coriyā dhuttiyā asatiyā chinnikāya pāpiyā bhinnasīlāya hiriatikkantikāya andhajanapalobhikāyā’ti.
mil5.1.5:11.10_0: ‘Saccaṁ, mahārāja, tādisikā ahaṁ, tādisikāyapi me, mahārāja, saccakiriyā atthi,
mil5.1.5:11.12_0: ‘katamā pana sā hoti saccakiriyā, iṅgha maṁ sāvehī’ti.
mil5.1.5:11.13_1: dhanaṁ deti khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā añño vā koci,
mil5.1.5:11.13_2: tesaṁ samakaṁyeva upaṭṭhahāmi, “khattiyo”ti viseso natthi, “suddo”ti atimaññanā natthi,
mil5.1.5:11.13_3: anunayappaṭighavippamuttā dhanassāmikaṁ paricarāmi, esā me, deva, saccakiriyā,
mil5.1.5:12.1_1: sacce ṭhitā na kiñci atthaṁ na vindanti.
mil5.1.5:12.2_1: sivirājena yācakassa cakkhūni, dibbacakkhūni ca uppannāni, tañca saccakiriyāya.
mil5.1.5:12.4_0: ‘maṁsacakkhusmiṁ naṭṭhe ahetusmiṁ avatthusmiṁ natthi dibbacakkhussa uppādo’ti.
mil5.1.5:12.5_0: Taṁ bhāvanāmayaṁ cakkhuṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, evametaṁ, mahārāja, dhārehī”ti.
mil5.1.5:12.6_0: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, sunibbeṭhito pañho, suniddiṭṭho niggaho, sumadditā paravādā,
